summary: The Tower of London is a famous castle on the River Thames. Built in 1078 by William the Conqueror, it was a symbol of power and sometimes a prison. The castle has been important in English history, with many famous people held there. It was also used for the Crown Jewels and other treasures. Today, it is a popular tourist spot, known for its history and the famous Beefeater guards. The Tower is over 900 years old and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Tower of London
